changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.comment: MO-943: Set IEZs to NOT automatically managed
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ZONE SET AUTO_MANAGED = 0 WHERE ZONE_OID IN (SELECT ZONE_OID FROM ZONE_MACHINE_RELATION WHERE ZONE_TYPE = 5)

rollback.sql: UPDATE ZONE SET AUTO_MANAGED = 1 WHERE ZONE_OID IN (SELECT ZONE_OID FROM ZONE_MACHINE_RELATION WHERE ZONE_TYPE = 5)
